question: Chilahati-Haldibari is a railway link between which two countries?
explanation:
The pre 1965 rail link between India and Bangladesh - Chilahati-Haldibari rail link has been inaugurated. In order to enhance the rail connectivity between the two countries, it was decided that six number of pre 1965 rail routes would be reopened. 
With the Chilahati-Haldibari rail link declared opened, five out of the said six routes are operational between India and Bangladesh.
